attributes.action: Stop the compulsory hotels quarantine scheme - let people isolate at home!
attributes.additional_details: Nowadays is hard as it is and charging families extra money for staying in prison-like conditions won’t help. We are all together in it so please use more discreet means: testing and home isolation.
attributes.background:
Dear government 
Please drop this unhumanistic and discriminative initiative. Let people isolate in their homes
Thanks

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Do not enforce mandatory hotel quarantines for international arrivals: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571682

No hotel quarantine for UK citizens, permanent residents and their families: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571447
